attributes.action: Save littlemill primary school from closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Proposals to close certain primary schools in east ayrshire.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save littlemill primary school from closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15539.asp

Prime Minister's Office
